messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([0-9]+,\s*)*[0-9]+'

Imagine a world with twelve rooms. From the lobby you have two choices, room 1 and room 2. You enter room 1, at the end thereâ€™s a door that leads to room 3, and room 3 leads to room 5. There is a door in room 5 that leads to room 7 and room 7 leads to room 9. From room 9 you can enter room 11. Thereâ€™s a chest in room 11. You open it and there is 10 dollars, but you do not take any money, youâ€™re just learning about the environment. Then you exit and start over. This time in the lobby you choose room 2, then enter room 4, which leads to room 6. There is a door in room 6 that leads to room 8 and room 8 leads to room 10. At the end there is a door that leads to room 12. Thereâ€™s a chest with 50 dollars in room 12, but you do not take any money, youâ€™re just learning about the environment. You return to the lobby. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most money. Which room from the lobby will lead to the path where one can make the most money?

answer: 10 Since it explicitly states that you are not allowed to take any money, but later lead to the room with the chest full of dollars, the number 10 is my best bet as there is no other option.

If you are looking for someone to keep your house neat and clean on a regular basis, then you should consider hiring a Los Angeles cleaning service for your home. By doing a simple Google search, you will find plenty of information about cleaning services in your local area. Here are some of the reasons why it is essential to hire a professional cleaning service for your home. It is imperative that your house is always clean. This can help avoid the accumulation of dirt and grime. A clean environment is a healthy environment. In addition, it can help prevent the spread of germs and other unwanted maladies. In addition, a clean home is less likely to harbor vermin like mice, roaches, spiders, etc. These are some of the reasons why you should hire a professional house cleaning Los Angeles service for your home. How often you ask? We think one time a month is the perfect amount of times.

Spiritual techniques are used to help come in closer contact with the spirit. As a result, we create a stronger bond with the divine realm. However, there are various principles to channeling your spiritual senses. Whatever connection you are seeking; know that there are more subtle vibratory levels of existence than the physical material plane. When you channel these senses, expect to experience intense vibrations of love and sustained joy throughout the body. As a result of this kind of energy work, you will be able to perceive an altered state of consciousness that is beyond the physical planes. Therefore, this experience can enhance your consciousness, giving you a glimpse into the workings of yourself from a soul-perspective. Below is a channeling exercise to help
user: Everyday I walk down the street. There are two houses: A tot other. One house has me sunning the upper portion, and the other has me being shadowed by the upper portion on one. One day I wake up early and decide to go onto the streets. It's cold and damp but I'm ready to face the early sunrise. I notice the sun coming out right behind the taller building and light up half the street.
